name: dev-debt-processor
description: Automatically processes Dev_Debt.md files using GitHub Copilot

devDebtProcessor.enabled.description: Enable automatic processing of Dev_Debt.md files on startup

devDebtProcessor.delaySeconds.description: Delay in seconds before processing Dev_Debt.md files

devDebtProcessor.strictValidation.description: Strictly validate that Dev_Debt.md only references files in its directory

devDebtProcessor.autoArchive.description: Automatically archive logs when VS Code is closed

devDebtProcessor.logRetentionDays.description: Number of days to keep archived logs before deletion
